changelog.version:
January 16th, 2019 - The current date v0.87 - "How about you name this one."
* Fixed resource icons pushing page elements downwards when visible.
* You can now name your loadouts by typing a name in the custom add amount box and then saving them. There is a 30 character max, and they can't only consist of numbers.
* Versions now have dates and names in the patchnotes.
* Patchnotes from the original version have been removed.

December 6th, 2018 - January 16th, 2019 v0.86 - "Customization, confirmation, checkboxes."
* Added a custom number input for the amount selections on the actions list.
* Amounts on the actions list are now formatted at values > 999,999.
* Formatted values now always have at least 3 digits of precision.
* Added a checkbox to pause when a loop fails. (this will trigger if your loop ends before you reach the last action)
* Added a confirmation when importing nothing, that warns you it will delete your save.

November 7th, 2018 - December 6th, 2018 v0.85 - "This one isn't illusory."
* New actions - Check Walls, Take Artifacts, Imbue Mind
* Pyromancy mana cost 12000 > 14000.
* Pyromancy self combat per level 10 > 5.
* Start Trek now requires 60% City Explored.
* The Crafting Guild and Adventure Guild rank bonuses at Godlike have been decreased. (77x > 10x)
* Chronomancy and Dark Magic now show their current bonus on their skill tooltips.
* Added commas to certain numbers >= 1,000 but < 9,999.
* Items that you can only get one of now display as icons always on the right side of your resources.
* Fixed minor typos/grammatical errors.
* Increased the icon size for actions by 4 pixels.
* The French translation has been disabled as it is currently broken, and no longer supported.

October 14th, 2018 - November 7th, 2018 v0.84 - "Stop going so fast."
* Chronomancy speed bonus sqrt(1 + level / 200) > (1 + level / 60) ^ 0.25.
* Dark Magic mana gain bonus (1 + level / 100) > (1 + level / 60) ^ 0.25.
* The action list height now saves on reload.

October 9th, 2018 - October 14th, 2018 v0.83 - "Bonus buttons."
* Added an additional loadout slot.
* Added 100/50 buttons to the amount selections on the actions list.
* Added buttons to the top right of the actions list that allow you to adjust its vertical length.
* When your loop ends during an action, your mana used that loop will now update properly.
* Fixed various tooltips not overlapping certain elements.

October 6th, 2018 - October 9th, 2018 v0.82 - "Please help I don't understand math."
* New action - Face Judgement.
* The talent multiplier formula has been changed to be worse at higher levels. (talent ^ 0.5 / 5) > (talent ^ 0.4 / 3)
* Mine Soulstones mana cost 2500 > 5000.
* Adjusted the placement of Pyromancy.
* The currently selected loadout stays highlighted on refresh.
* Fixed the mana cost reductions from Witch Knowledge and Runes Deciphered being applied improperly.
* Fixed the Witch Knowledge Dark Ritual mana cost reduction not increasing the speed of the ritual to account for the reduced cost.

October 3rd, 2018 - October 6th, 2018 v0.81 - "A new hobby."
* New action - Bird Watching.
* Fixed the speed bonuses Dark Ritual and Chronomancy draining bonus seconds faster.

September 27th, 2018 - October 3rd, 2018 v0.80 - "The fine print."
* New action - Looping Potion.
* Dark Ritual now has bonuses for rituals 21-60, and a new unlimited per ritual bonus.
* Chronomancy speed bonus sqrt(1 + level / 100) > sqrt(1 + level / 200).
* The short forms of stat names have been capitalized.
* Checkboxes have been vertically aligned.
* Colons have been added to the end of resources with counts.
* Fixed various minor bugs.

September 20th, 2018 - September 27th, 2018 v0.79 - "Flowers and fire and trolls, oh my!"
* Descriptions, flavor text, and tooltips have been changed in various places.
* New actions - Follow Flowers, Mine Soulstones, Pyromancy, Hunt Trolls
* Dark Ritual exp bonus 2000% -> 1000%
* Dark Magic now reduces your reputation by 1 per completion.
* Dark Ritual reputation requirement 0 or less -> -5 or less
* Clear Thicket unlock 60% Forest Explored -> 20% Flower Trail Followed
* Clear Thicket mana cost 300 -> 500
* Explore Cavern no longer requires the pickaxe.
* The font size on actions has been reduced by 1 pixel.

August 18th, 2018 - September 20th, 2018 v0.78 - "Is it just me or is it getting evil in here?"
* New actions - Clear Thicket, Talk to Witch, Dark Magic, Dark Ritual, Buy Pickaxe
* Removed actions - Tournament
* New zone - Mt. Olympus
* Changed the colors for soul and charisma
* Old Shortcut mana cost 1200 -> 800
* Talk to Hermit mana cost 2000 -> 1200

stories.story: You're a simple courier, on a long trip to deliver a high priority package. Just as you entered town, you tripped - breaking your glasses - and the package burst open, spilling a strange liquid on you. Immediately, your meager amount of mana started draining rapidly. Right as your mana became empty, you found yourself back in the moment the liquid was absorbed into your skin, with your tiny reserves filled... yet draining just as before. This happened again and again, the world resetting with you, until you decided you had to figure out a way to prolong how long these 'loops' were. Mana crystals are often stored in pottery around town, perhaps you'll start there ...

You reach the end of the dungeon, where a softly glowing orb floats on a pedastal. You've found the dungeon core - for the first level of the dungeon, at least. As you grasp it, the essence dives into you, infusing your very being with the power it holds. It is a small amount of power, but this is a small dungeon. You'll be back to take this power again, knowing with the foreign knowledge implanted that it will stay with you no matter when you are.

You reach the end of the dungeon again, but for the first time the core isn't glowing. It's always been thought that dungeon cores build based on the mana spent around them, but you're beginning to think the essence of it's previous incarnations drains it somehow. It doesn't always happen, but you'll need to put more mana into the world to take the core's benefits out of it. You shrug, accepting yet another oddity of the loops.
You've done it! You've won the tournament and obtained the cure. You can stop looping at any moment. But, there's still a little more you want to do ... (GAME COMPLETE, keep playing if you want).

town0.name: 新手村
town0.desc: 地下室的老鼠，具攻击性的野猪，弹跳的史莱姆，还有喜欢暴露自己身体的陌生人是一些新手村很常见的东西。 有些人没有头盔或鞋子，附近能找到最好的剑也只能是铁造的。你在这里开始回圈真是幸运。 如果这里没有这麽多规矩限制不能做一些危险的事，那就完美了。

town1.name: 森林小径
town1.desc: 一大片常绿的森林。你能感受到魔力的流动，但在暗处，你感应一股邪恶的意念...

town2.name: 商人城
town2.desc: 商人城! 一个小小的城镇但充满活力。在这里可以找到很多景点，例如图书馆，冒险者公会，匠人公会，还在市集。呀，我有提及这里还有一大堆容易上当的傻瓜吗?

town3.name: 奥林匹斯山
town3.desc: 你明明可以沿路走到其他城市的，但不! 你 一定 要来奥林匹斯山, 是嘛。好吧，既然都抵达了，年轻的你总是能学到不少东西的。还可以顺道屠杀一些无辜的巨魔。

town4.name: 英灵殿
town4.desc: 一个弥漫着欢乐和各种好事物的城市。维京人，啤酒，天使，啤酒，诸如此类，还有啤酒! 你可以在大堂内或在郊区度过美好的时光。无论如何，你一定会玩得很开心。

town5.name: 老手村
town5.desc: 一个你很熟悉的地方，但现在布满暗影和在宿醉时那种恶心不祥的感觉。在村的正中心有一条发出阴沉紫色的光柱，从一座被黑云包围的尖塔散发出来。还有 10 条较弱的紫光散落在村内的不同地点，所有暗影好像都是从这里来的。可能你会想去调查一下。

他们不喜欢你讨价还价，但 - 好吧，你不会再来了。
消耗 1 点声望把补给物资的购买价减少 20 黄金。
战斗和魔法技能总和至少达到 35 级时解锁。

start_journey.label: 开始你的旅程
start_journey.tooltip:
沿着这条路你会到达下一个城市。你要继续前进直至找到打断这个无限回圈的办法。
消耗 1 份补给物资。完成一次以解锁森林小径的行动项目，再完成一次即可开始执行森林小径的行动。
战斗和魔法技能总和至少达到 35 级时解锁。

open_rift.label: 打开空间裂缝
open_rift.tooltip:
运用你丰富的黑魔法知识和技术，你可以打开通往影字国度的裂缝并直接抵达老手村。
黑魔法 500 级时解锁。

train_soul.label: 在瀑布旁边坐下
train_soul.tooltip:
这是一个恬淡而自然的地方。嘈杂，但和平。
这个行动可获得 4x 经验及天赋成长，每回圈只能做
次。
森林探索度 70% 时解锁。

practical_magic.label: 练习实用魔法
practical_magic.tooltip:
这些魔法的基础运用可以帮助你完成各种日常琐事。真是天才的发明。要从隐士身上获得这些知识，好像是要他命似的。
隐士知识学习度 20% 及魔法技巧 50 级时解锁。

learn_alchemy.label: 学习炼金术
learn_alchemy.tooltip:
在制作治疗和回复药水的时候你能听到他一直在碎碎念。
你开始觉得令你跌入这个回圈的药水只是使用了一种成份比较复杂的配方。
你提供材料; 消耗 10 份药草。
获得炼金术及魔法技巧的经验。
隐士知识学习度 40% 及魔法技巧 60 级时解锁。

brew_potions.label: 酿造药水
brew_potions.tooltip:
泡泡加烧瓶。药水加魔法。
需要至少 5 点声望，否则他不会让你碰他的装置。
消耗 10 份药草制作一支可在下个城市出售的药水。
获得炼金术及魔法技巧的经验。
炼金术 10 级时解锁。

train_dex.label: 灵巧锻炼
train_dex.tooltip:
这里有一连串石头让你跳来跳去。超好玩的。
这个行动可获得 4x 经验及天赋成长，每回圈只能做
次。
森林探索度 60% 时解锁。

train_spd.label: 速度锻炼
train_spd.tooltip:
森林狂奔超棒。在挑战极限的过程你学到很多东西。
这个行动可获得 4x 经验及天赋成长，每回圈只能做
次。
森林探索度 80% 时解锁。

follow_flowers.label: 沿花径前行
follow_flowers.tooltip:
你发现这里有一条由鲜花铺成的小径，和周围环境格格不入。为什麽不看下会通往哪里? 沿途你可以找到更多的药草。
戴上眼镜可获得 2x 效率。
森林探索度 50% 时解锁。

bird_watching.label: 观鸟
bird_watching.tooltip:
在花径的尽头，是一个由很多不同品种的鸟类组成的生境。你又可以多添一项兴趣了。
需要眼镜才看到。
这个行动可获得 4x 经验及天赋成长，每回圈只能做
次。
花径探索度 80% 时解锁。

clear_thicket.label: 清除灌木丛
clear_thicket.tooltip:
花径指向一处灌木丛，这个地方荒无人烟。可能是一些奇怪的魔法效果导致的。清除灌木丛，你可以找到更多的野外魔力源。
花径探索度 20% 时解锁。

witch.label: 和女巫对话
witch.tooltip:
和女巫对话可以学习到黑暗技艺的奥秘。
灌木丛探索度 60% 及魔法技巧 80 级时解锁。
每 1% 女巫知识额外降低黑魔法和黑暗祭礼的魔力消耗 0.5%。

dark_magic.label: 黑魔法
dark_magic.tooltip:
投入黑暗技艺的怀抱来更有效率地采集魔力。但代价是甚麽?
增加 -1 点声望。
需要声望在 0 点或以下。
女巫知识学习度 20% 及魔法技巧 100 级时解锁。

dark_ritual.label: 黑暗祭礼
dark_ritual.tooltip:
献祭越来越多的灵魂石给黑暗之神，令所有在新手村的行动获得 10% 永久速度加成。
每 1 点魔力给予 (黑魔法) * (1 + 主要能力 / 100) * (原始魔力消耗 / 实际魔力消耗) 进度。
需要声望在 -5 点或以下。
每回圈只能进行一次黑暗祭礼。
城市探索进度 50% 时解锁。灌木丛探索度 90% 及黑魔法 50 级时解锁。
献祭 (50 * (已完成黑暗祭礼数+1)) 颗灵魂石。

continue_on.label: 继续走
continue_on.tooltip:
再不断前行会到达下一个城市，商人城。
每 1% 捷径探索度减少魔力消耗 60 点。

purchase_mana.label: 买魔力
purchase_mana.tooltip: 1 黄金 = 50 魔力。能买多少就买多少。

sell_potions.label: 卖药水
sell_potions.tooltip: 药水每瓶可换取和炼金术等级相等的黄金，但你要花时间寻找买家。

read_books.label: 看书
read_books.tooltip:
这里有个图书馆! 你一直很爱看书。
在书中发现新世界和各种体验，从故事角色身上找到灵感，为他们的遭遇感到难过 - 感同身受的你想要变得更强。
需要眼镜才看到。
这个行动可获得 4x 经验及天赋成长，每回圈只能做
次。
城市探索进度 50% 时解锁。

gather_team.label: 组队
gather_team.tooltip:
你不用独自面对它们。
最多可以和另外 5 人组成一支队伍。
消耗
黄金，队伍中每多一人，招募下一位队员时需要消耗额外 200 黄金。
每位成员增加 (冒险者公会排名) * (战斗技巧 / 2) 到你的团队战斗技能。
需要先加入冒险者公会。
这个行动可获得 3x 经验及天赋成长
城市探索进度 20% 时解锁。

craft_armor.label: 制作盔甲
craft_armor.tooltip:
努力把兽皮打造成盔甲。
每 1 点盔甲增加 (20% * 匠人公会排名) 到个人战斗技能。
消耗 2 张兽皮。
城市探索进度 30% 时解锁。

smash_pots.label: 打碎陶罐
smash_pots.tooltip:
它们就放在那里，未被破坏的，充满潜力。
有魔力的陶罐藏有
smash_pots.tooltip2:
魔力。
每 10 个陶罐就有一个藏有魔力。

locks.label: 开锁
locks.tooltip:
不用担心 - 他们不会记得的。
藏有黄金的房屋有
locks.tooltip2:
黄金。
每 10 间房屋就有一间藏有黄金。
探索进度 20% 时解锁。

short_quest.label: 简单任务
short_quest.tooltip:
成为英雄! ...如果可以获得回报而且不需要很久的话。
有回报的简单任务会给
short_quest.tooltip2:
黄金作为回报。
每 5 个简单任务就有一个有回报。
和村民聊天 5% 时解锁。

long_quest.label: 高级任务
long_quest.tooltip:
成为一个给人留下深刻印象的英雄! ...只要有谁看到的话。
有回报的高级任务会给
long_quest.tooltip2:
黄金和 1 点声望作为回报。
每 5 个高级任务就有一个有回报。
调查进度 10% 时解锁。

wild_mana.label: 野外魔力
wild_mana.info_text1: 富含魔力的野外魔力源剩馀
wild_mana.info_text2: 富含魔力的野外魔力源总数
wild_mana.tooltip:
大部分冒险者都难以发现这些天然的魔力源，但你有的是时间。
每个富含魔力的野外魔力源可提供
wild_mana.tooltip2:
魔力。
每 10 个野外魔力源就有一个充满魔力。

gather_herbs.label: 收获药草
gather_herbs.tooltip:
可以派上用场的就都挖一下吧。
每 10 棵有趣的植物就有一棵可用作药草。
森林探索度 10% 时解锁。

hunt.label: 狩猎
hunt.info_text1: 可获取兽皮的动物剩馀
hunt.info_text2: 可获取兽皮的动物总数
hunt.info_text3: 未尝试获取兽皮的动物总数
hunt.tooltip:
森林的天然资源。
每 10 只动物就有一只可获取兽皮。
森林探索度 40% 时解锁。

gamble.label: 赌博
gamble.tooltip:
你的手牌总算是每个回圈都不一样的。
这个行动可获得 2x 经验及天赋成长。
消耗 20 黄金和 1 点声望。
需要至少 -5 点声望。
每 10 个赌徒就有 1 个是容易上当的，他们都很好骗。每次赌赢获得 60 黄金。

heal_sick.label: 医治病人
heal_sick.tooltip:
你没可能把每一个人都治好，但他们会很感激你的。
治疗由 3 个部分组成，每部分有一个对应的能力 - 诊断 (感)，医治 (智)，教导 (魅)。
每 1 点魔力给予 (魔法技巧) * (1 + 主要能力 / 100) * sqrt(1 + 治疗次数 / 100) * (原始魔力消耗 / 实际魔力消耗) 进度。
需要至少 12 级魔法技巧和 1 点声望。
每治好一名患者，获得 3 点声望。
每完成一次行动，给予 10 点魔法技巧经验。

fight_monsters.label: 打怪
fight_monsters.tooltip:
你慢慢读懂怪物的出现规律了。
战斗由 3 种类别循环组成，每部分有一种对应的能力 - 快速 (速)，退守 (力)，进取 (体)。
每 1 点魔力给予 (个人战斗) * (1 + 主要能力 / 100) * sqrt(1 + 击杀总数 / 100) * (原始魔力消耗 / 实际魔力消耗) 进度。
需要至少 10 级战斗技巧和 2 点声望。
每完成一段战斗，获得 20 黄金。
每完成一次行动，给予 10 点战斗技巧经验。

segment_names.name: 鹿
巨龟
哥布林
恶魔兔
巨型蜜獾
毒蛇
愤怒的猴子
巨魔
食人魔
小妖精
树人
立方体胶质怪
羽妖精
兽人
眼魔
幽灵
拟形怪
蔓生怪
腐化磨菇怪
巨型猫头鹰
鲜血巨魔
小型飞龙
位移兽
惧噬体
灵吸怪
底栖魔鱼
古龙
巫妖
泰拉斯奎巨兽
半巫妖
半神
真神
混蛋鹿
混蛋鹿而且比以前大只了
混蛋鹿而且比以前更大只了
混蛋鹿而且比以前又更大只了
混蛋鹿而且比以前再更巨大了
混蛋鹿而且这也太荒谬地大只了

small_dungeon.label: 小型地下城
small_dungeon.tooltip:
地下城每次都有一些微小的变化; 这个就比较难适应了。灵魂石即使在回圈重启後依然会保留下来，但它们不一定会出现... 奇怪。
地下城每段需要运用不同的能力。
如果你的能力足够高，一次行动可以打通多层地下城。
每 1 点魔力给予 (魔法技巧 + 个人战斗) * (1 + 主要能力 / 100) * sqrt(1 + 已完成总层数 / 200) * (原始魔力消耗 / 实际魔力消耗) 进度。
需要战斗和魔法技能总和至少达到 35 级和 2 点声望。
每完成一层，获得 1 颗灵魂石 - 鼠标悬停在 已完成 可以看到更多资讯。
每完成一次行动，给予 5 点战斗技巧经验和魔法技巧经验。
small_dungeon.completed_tooltip:
每颗灵魂石可以提高任意能力的经验获得 (1+(灵魂石数量)^.8/30) 倍。
每层都会有 1 颗灵魂石，当成功取得时，会暂时减少下次灵魂石出现的机率 2%。
每 1 点魔力消耗会回复所有层数灵魂石的出现率 .00001%。

large_dungeon.label: 大型地下城
large_dungeon.tooltip:
和你的队员一起，你终於有机会向一个人应付不来的大规模地下城挑战了。
每 1 点魔力给予 (魔法技巧 + 团队战斗) * (1 + 主要能力 / 100) * sqrt(1 + 已完成总层数 / 200) * (原始魔力消耗 / 实际魔力消耗) 进度。
需要最少 1 名队友。
每完成一层，获得 10 颗灵魂石 - 鼠标悬停在 已完成 可以看到更多资讯。
每完成一次行动，给予 15 点战斗技巧经验和魔法技巧经验。
large_dungeon.completed_tooltip:
每颗灵魂石可以提高任意能力的经验获得 (1+(灵魂石数量)^.8/30) 倍。
每层都会有 10 颗灵魂石，当成功取得时，会暂时减少下次灵魂石出现的机率 2%。
每 1 点魔力消耗会回复所有层数灵魂石的出现率 .00001%。

adventure_guild.label: 冒险者公会
adventure_guild.tooltip:
为你的日常冒险需要提供一站式服务。
接受试炼然後获得排名!
你只能同时加入一个公会，而且只能挑战一次。
每级排名给予 200 点魔力。
每 1 点魔力给予 ((魔法技巧)/2 + (个人战斗)) * (1 + 主要能力 / 100) * sqrt(1 + 已打动次数 / 1000) * (原始魔力消耗 / 实际魔力消耗) 进度。
传闻情报进度 20% 时解锁。

craft_guild.label: 匠人公会
craft_guild.tooltip:
学会动手做大型建设。
接受试炼然後获得排名!
你只能同时加入一个公会，而且只能挑战一次。
每级排名给予 50 制作经验和 10 黄金。
每 1 点魔力给予 ((魔法技巧)/2 + (制作技巧)) * (1 + 主要能力 / 100) * sqrt(1 + 已感动次数 / 1000) * (原始魔力消耗 / 实际魔力消耗) 进度。
传闻情报进度 30% 时解锁。

buy_pickaxe.label: 买十字镐
buy_pickaxe.tooltip:
你想方设法终於和卖十字镐的商人联系上了，经过多番游说总算能用 200 黄金购买十字镐。
影响任何附有 十字镐 图示的行动。
十字镐每回圈限买一次。
城市探索进度 90% 时解锁。

start_trek.label: 登山
start_trek.tooltip:
开始向奥林匹斯山顶进发。
城市探索度 60% 时解锁。

climb_mountain.label: Climb Mountain
climb_mountain.tooltip:
Traversing the mountain will be difficult, but you can use your pickaxe as a makeshift climbing pick of sorts to help you get around.
2x progress with pickaxe.

mana_geyser.label: Mana Geyser
mana_geyser.tooltip:
Search the ground for weak points in the hopes of revealing massive mana geysers.
Spots with geysers have 5000 mana.
Every 100 weak points has a mana geyser.
Requires pickaxe.

decipher_runes.label: Decipher Runes
decipher_runes.tooltip:
There are many different runic markings on weathered headstones around the mountain, perhaps you can glean some sort of knowledge from them.
Reduces mana cost of Chronomancy and Pyromancy by 0.5% per 1% of Glyphs Deciphered.
2x progress with glasses.
Unlocked at 20% Mountain Explored.

chronomancy.label: Chronomancy
chronomancy.tooltip:
Controlling time seems like it would be a great idea, and thankfully for you, the runes around here contain lots of information on the art of Chronomancy.
Unlocked with both 30% Runic Symbols Deciphered and 150 Magic.

looping_potion.label: Looping Potion
looping_potion.tooltip:
Using your aptness of alchemy and your talent for time, you've managed to recreate the very potion that got you into this whole mess! It can't cure you, but maybe you can find another use for it. (this does nothing right now)
Requires 200 herbs.
Unlocked with both 60 Alchemy and 100 Chronomancy.
Gives 100 Alchemy exp upon action completion.

pyromancy.label: Pyromancy
pyromancy.tooltip:
Conjure the power of feverishly forceful and furiously firey flickering flames to aid you in combat. And yeah, the runes contain some stuff about this too.
Unlocked with both 60% Runic Symbols Deciphered and 200 Magic.

explore_cavern.label: Explore Cavern
explore_cavern.tooltip:
Explore the expansive and twisting cavern beneath the mountain, who knows what wonders (or terrors) you'll find down there.
Unlocked at 40% Mountain Explored.

mine_soulstones.label: Mine Soulstones
mine_soulstones.tooltip:
Extract soulstones lodged in the walls of the tunnels in the massive underground cavern.
Every 10 shiny spots has a soulstone.
Requires pickaxe.
Unlocked with 20% Cavern Explored.

hunt_trolls.label: Hunt Trolls
hunt_trolls.tooltip:
The cavern is teeming with trolls, but thankfully they appear to by friendly from the encounters you've had with them. However, you could do with some troll's blood.
Gives (self combat) * (1 + main stat / 100) * sqrt(1 + times completed / 100) * (original mana cost / actual mana cost) progress points per mana.
Unlocked with 50% Cavern Explored.
Gives 1,000 Combat exp per troll kill.

segment_names.name: Find a Hiding Spot
Scream Very Loudly to Lure Out the Troll
Pounce on the Troll
Fight the Troll
Drain the Troll's Blood

check_walls.label: Check Walls
check_walls.tooltip:
Now that you know the ins and outs of the cavern, you start to notice certain spots of the walls that are illusory! There seems to be all manner of goodies hidden behind them.
Unlocked with 80% Cavern Explored.

take_artifacts.label: Take Artifacts
take_artifacts.tooltip:
Behind some of the illusory walls, there are various sorts of artifacts that seems to belong to some sort of ancient civilization. Or at least that's what you'll say if anybody comes looking for them. (these do nothing right now)
Every 25 alcoves has an artifact.
Unlocked with 5% Illusory Walls Discovered.

imbue_mind.label: Imbue Mind
imbue_mind.tooltip:
Deep behind one of the many illusory walls, you've found a small glowing lake full of some sort of liquid. Your soulstones seem to glow when they get close to it. You appear to be able to use them as a link to your mind, but the process requires a very large amount of mana and will destroy them once it's complete. Each imbuement will increase the training limit by 1.
Gives (magic skill) * (1 + main stat / 100) * (original mana cost / actual mana cost) progress points per mana.
Can only have 1 Imbue Mind action.
Unlocked with both 70% Illusory Walls Discovered and 300 Magic.
Sacrifices (20 * (imbuements+1)) soulstones.

face_judgement.label: Face Judgement
face_judgement.tooltip: Face the judgement of the gods. If your reputation is 50 or higher, you'll be accepted into their good graces and granted passage to Valhalla. If your reputation is -50 or lower, you'll be cast into the shadow realm and thrown back to the beginning of your journey. (this does nothing right now)

mercantilism.label: Mercantilism
mercantilism.tooltip: Practice your merchandising skills, which are sorely lacking considering how poor of a deal you're getting from those mana merchants.

fall_from_grace.label: Fall From Grace
fall_from_grace.tooltip: Looks like the only way out of this place is to make them dislike you enough to kick you out. Some moderate vandalism will probably do the job. You'll be cast into the shadow realm and thrown back to the beginning of your journey, but at least you'll go out with a bang!
